long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
RatePunk is a browser extension that leads you throughout the whole hotel booking journey, popping out every time you could potentially save some money on your travels. 
8 money-saving hacks - all in one FREE tool. 

What are these hacks? How did they save our users $19M+ so far, and how can you save up to a few hundred on every hotel you book? 

To give you all these answers, we wanted a real user-experience example. Below, youâ€™ll find 8 travel hacking questions and travelersâ€™ answers BEFORE installing RatePunk & AFTER. 

ğŸ‘‰ How much did the hotel you booked last cost on other booking websites? 

BEFORE: The hell knows, why would I check ğŸ¤¨
AFTER: RatePunk said itâ€™s $145 on Priceline, $229 on Expedia and $252 on Booking.com, how bout that ğŸ˜

ğŸ‘‰ Was the phone price or the desktop price better? 

BEFORE: I still have no idea what youâ€™re talking about. I booked with my phone, and thatâ€™s it. ğŸ˜¡
AFTER: RatePunk showed me that the mobile price was lower, so I booked there ğŸ«³ğŸ¤

ğŸ‘‰ Do you use no-commission booking websites? 

BEFORE: ğŸ™…â€¦ what are these? 
AFTER: Yes! RatePunkâ€™s users have access to zero-margin hotel prices on their website, so I book there when they have the best deal. 

ğŸ‘‰ Have you ever tried negotiating the price for your wanted Airbnb? 

BEFORE: YOU CAN DO THAT? ğŸ™€
AFTER: Yeps, and itâ€™s quite easy to land a deal. RatePunk has this one-click negotiator, so I donâ€™t need to get involved in any long discussions. ğŸ¤˜

ğŸ‘‰ Did you know Airbnb properties are also listed on other booking websites?

BEFORE: ğŸ˜¢ ??? 
AFTER: I booked my last Airbnb on Booking.com, actually. RatePunk redirected me there & I didnâ€™t need to pay the huge cleaning fee. ğŸ¤‘

ğŸ‘‰ Do you track price changes before booking the hotel? 

BEFORE: I find a good deal - I take it, so no. âŒ
AFTER: If Iâ€™m booking long in advance - I activate the RatePunk price tracking toggle. ğŸ”› It sends me an email when the price drops & I book it then! 

ğŸ‘‰ Have you ever tried connecting to another country to score a better hotel deal? 

BEFORE: I need to MOVE to get a good price now?! ğŸ¥´
AFTER: RatePunk lets me know if another country gets access to a better rate. Then I use my VPN service ğŸŒ & book it from there. 

ğŸ‘‰ Does REBOOKING say anything to you? 

BEFORE: I donâ€™t like this quiz anymoreâ€¦ ğŸš¶
AFTER: Oh, I activate this feature when I book a free-cancellation hotel. RatePunk then sends me an email ğŸ“©  if the price drops afterwards, so I can cancel it & rebook it for that better price. 

*the whole thing is entirely true, except for the parts that are all made up

There are only 5 steps in between the BEFORE & AFTER: 

1ï¸âƒ£ Add to Chrome
2ï¸âƒ£ Go to your favorite booking site (Expedia, Booking.com, Priceline, Agoda, Airbnb)
3ï¸âƒ£ Pick a hotel/property you want to book
4ï¸âƒ£ RatePunk will pop up & show you all the possible savings
5ï¸âƒ£ Be 100% sure youâ€™re never overpaying.

_____

Not to brag or anything but: 

ğŸ† Weâ€™re named among the 10 Best Money-Saving Apps by the US News. 
ğŸ† Weâ€™re listed among the 9 free browser extensions that will save you money online by Tech Advisor. 

_____

Thereâ€™s a team hustling on this 24/7. If you have any questions, troubles or want to share your AFTER experience, contact us at hi@ratepunk.com and letâ€™s make RatePunk the ultimate travel tool together. 

Affiliate Disclosure
RatePunk uses affiliate programs to support its free services. This means that when you book a hotel through our extension, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you. This helps us keep the extension free and improve your experience.

Check out our homepage for more: https://www.ratepunk.com/
